info.brief_description: Strange events begins to occur on a school as the academic staff begins to swap bodies
info.description:
This is a New version of the Anime "Body Swap"


Like the original story , in occurs on a high school; it has been isolated from the outside in a new dimension (You will take part as the awareness of this dimension), no one can enter and no one can leave, There is a main character but it's not necessary to stick only to his point of view, the academic staff travels between any body in this dimension whit no real control of in which body land or when it will happens, yet having an orgasm may trigger the change. By the way, the more time the characters spend in this new dimension the more horny they will feel. When they are back in their original bodies, they may or may not remember what have their bodies done when their "soul" was absent, and if they do remember, they will only see quick images.

In addition (and for the fetish lovers like me ) the dimension (obviously you will take that part ) may encourage them to pursue their most wild dreams or most deviant fantasies, to do it, it can alter their personalities or make appear things outside the dimension such as clothing, costumes, or sex toys.

Rules:
*Chapters must be detailed (At very least 4 lines), the more the best (specially the sex related chapters, since it is an important part of the history)
*No vore, shrink or fatten, there are a lot of histories about that already.
*If two characters feel true love between them, they may go out, if so end the story.
*Anything besides that, goes.

Characters: (As soon as I can I will upload images of them)
(Students)
Leon (16): Main character; a serious and little pervert guy (yet no one knows this), he longs for a girlfriend.
Dyan (16): The idol of the school, very feminine and kind, she loves the animals and almost every guy in the school have a crush on her.
Charles (17): The best friend of Leon, he's very handsome, yet Dyan keeps rejecting him from being a little jerk.
Beverly (16): An outgoing girl, she's Leon's neighbor, and her childhood friend.
Karin (15): She's a tomboyish girl, yet she is very kind and has a great sense of justice, her best friend is Beverly.
Jasmine (15): A delicate and shy girl, has a secret crush on Leon.
Anya (14): the little sister of Dyan, her best friend is Jasmine.
Fleur (17): The most respected student, she's intelligent and knows kung-fu, no one tries to hit on her, her best friend is Dyan, and act as her body guard.
Scarlet: (18): A sluttish cheerleader, she hates Fleur and she's the classic bitch.
Elias (15): A transfer student, he's very shy and and a little girlish.

(other Academic Staff)
Jane (32): PE teacher, she's Dyan's and Anya's single mother and there are a lot of gossips around her.
Katherine (22): English teacher and Leon's big sister
Isabella (28): Latin teacher, friends whit Katherine and Elias mother
